event_types.name: INVOICING.INVOICE.CANCELLED

event_types.description: An invoice is paid, partially paid, or payment is made and is pending.

event_types.name: INVOICING.INVOICE.REFUNDED
event_types.description: An invoice is refunded or partially refunded.

event_types.name: INVOICING.INVOICE.SCHEDULED

event_types.name: INVOICING.INVOICE.UPDATED
event_types.description: An invoice is updated.

event_types.name: LOYALTY.REWARDS-PAYOUT.COMPLETED

event_types.name: BILLING.PLAN.UPDATED

event_types.name: BILLING.SUBSCRIPTION.ACTIVATED

event_types.name: BILLING.SUBSCRIPTION.EXPIRED

event_types.name: BILLING.SUBSCRIPTION.PAYMENT.FAILED

event_types.name: BILLING.SUBSCRIPTION.RE-ACTIVATED

event_types.name: BILLING.SUBSCRIPTION.UPDATED

event_types.name: CATALOG.PRODUCT.CREATED

event_types.name: CATALOG.PRODUCT.UPDATED

event_types.name: CHECKOUT.ORDER.COMPLETED

event_types.name: CHECKOUT.ORDER.DECLINED

event_types.name: CHECKOUT.ORDER.VOIDED

event_types.name: COLLECTION.ACTIVITY.EXECUTED

event_types.name: COMPLIANCE.PROCESS.END-USER-ACTION-REQUIRED

event_types.description: Webhook event emitted after the non-loginable account have been updated.

event_types.name: CUSTOMER.MERCHANT-BALANCE.CHANGED

event_types.description: This event is triggered as flow starts by merchant

event_types.description: This event is triggered as flow starts by merchant

event_types.name: CUSTOMER.NEGATIVE-BALANCE.ACTIVE
